trait.name: Shadow Wings
entries: Toulon can unfurl its wings and create an aura of darkness within a 30-foot radius, negating normal and magical light of 3rd level or lower. Toulon can create or dismiss this darkness as an action.

trait.name: Heart Devourer
entries: When Toulon hits a creature with an attack, the target must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 4d12 + 5 piercing damage and 4d10 + 4 psychic damage. If the target dies, Toulon devours its heart, gaining 50 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Dark Aura
entries: All creatures within 30 feet of Toulon have a -2 penalty to saving throws and attack rolls while within the Dark Aura.

trait.name: Bladestorm Assault
entries: Toulon transforms into an Avatar of Serrated Annihilation. It releases a swirling vortex of razor-sharp blades in a 60-foot cone. Creatures caught in the cone must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, they take 10d10 slashing damage and suffer a bleeding wound. At the start of each of their turns, creatures affected by the bleeding wound take an additional 1d6 slashing damage. The bleeding effect persists until they receive magical healing or succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw to staunch the bleeding. The affected creatures are also blinded for 1 minute. They can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the blindness on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Toulon makes three attacks: one with its antler and two with its claws.

action.name: Antler
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 + 5 piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}2d8 + 5 slashing damage.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The shadow wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Chilling Touch
entries: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4d6 + 4 cold damage.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow wraith can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadowy Tendrils
entries: The shadow beast can extend its shadowy tendrils up to 10 feet and make a grapple attack as a bonus action. On a hit, the target is grappled (escape DC 12). While grappled, the target takes 7 (2d6) necrotic damage at the start of its turn.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.
